title: Minimal Logo Design for Home Decor Business
desc: This is a vector-based logo for home decor business, that uses low saturated pastel colors to achieve a modern look. It also includes home decor items, while also presenting the business name in a creative manner.

title: Metaball Characterized Sample Logo
desc: This is a sample logo design that uses modern and minimal theme. The main elements closely relate to 3D metaball. This logo uses depth to make the design more vibrant and modern.

title: Metaball Characterized Sample Logo (Dark)
desc: This is a sample logo design that uses modern and minimal theme. The main elements closely relate to 3D metaball. This logo uses depth to make the design more vibrant and modern.

title: Simple Design for Shopping Related Logos
desc: This design makes use of shadows to achieve a depth factor. This, along with some really vibrant and modern themed colors make this design perfect to be used as symbols on a website!

title: Modern and Minimal Professional Brochure Design
desc: This is a modern, minimal brochure design for educational businesses, that is super clean, and easy to read, and uses abstract elements to make it fun, yet very professional. This uses a unique and modern themed color scheme, and a clean font too. All these together just makes this brochure a strong attention-grabber.

title: Minimal Logo Design for Plumbing Services
desc: Using abstract elements and color schemes that match the plumbing business, I was able to create these logo designs that are clean, professional, and attention grabbers.

title: Minimal Logo Design for Plumbing Services
desc: Using abstract elements and color schemes that match the plumbing business, I was able to create these logo designs that are clean, professional, and attention grabbers.

title: Symbolic Logo Design
desc: Starting with a very harsh symbol for the design and then after 'mitigating' it using modern designing techniques, I was able to design this cool looking logo.

title: Logo Design for Vector Designer
desc: Using some relatively common elements from vector designing, and after combining them with some cool gradients, I ended up with this cool and vibrant logo.

title: Banner Design for a Gift Shop Business
desc: After searching through some samples, effects and color schemes on the internet, I created this modern and amazing look banner design for gift shops.

title: Modern, Minimal Abstract Logo design (Dark)
desc: This logo utilizes modern theme, unique design, creative color scheme, and abstract elements to present itself in a fun and creative way. Using subtle gradients enhances this design and elevates it to another level,

title: Soup Advertisement Poster/Flyer Sample
desc: This design uses abstract elements to create a visually appealing and eye-catching experience for the reader, while also giving all the required information.
